name: No zombie land: Lucy
description:
No zombie land: Lucy is a freestyle shooter 3D lawn mowing game.
Lucy arrives at an abandoned village full of mutated zombies, and in order to survive, you need to keep fighting.

game
Highly open and free fire, automatically attacking zombies just by moving the character.

gameplay
WSAD controls the role. SHIFT to run, jump.
24 zombies are summoned at a time, and you need to kill all of them to get to the next level. There will be a BOSS for every 10 levels you pass.
Kill all you want in zombie land.
